mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(reported_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS report_day, COUNT(*) AS count FROM CAR_RECALL WHERE reported_at >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(reported_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY report_day ASC

SELECT report_id, car_model, reporter_name, is_reviewed as reviewed, TO_CHAR(reported_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as reported_at FROM CAR_RECALL WHERE reported_at >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 ORDER BY reported_at DESC
